SELECT r.id, r.role_name roleName, r.enabled, r.create_by createBy, r.create_time createTime, u.user_name userName FROM sys_user u INNER JOIN sys_user_role ur ON u.id = ur.user_id INNER JOIN sys_role r ON ur.role_id = r.id WHERE u.id = #{userId}

SELECT r.id, r.role_name roleName, r.enabled, r.create_by createBy, r.create_time createTime FROM sys_user u INNER JOIN sys_user_role ur ON u.id = ur.user_id INNER JOIN sys_role r ON ur.role_id = r.id WHERE u.id = #{userId} and r.enabled=#{enabled}
